mainBoard.text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When this creature is turned face up, return all Zombie cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: You do not have to find a Zombie card or swamp card if you do not want to, even if you have them in your library.

mainBoard.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

foreignData.flavorText: Quand peste et mort font bon ménage.
foreignData.name: Goule délétère
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que la Goule délétère ou un autre zombie arrive en jeu, toutes les créatures non-zombie gagnent -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Seuchen und Tod im praktischen Doppelpack.
foreignData.name: Schädlingsghul
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Schädlingsghul oder ein anderer Zombie ins Spiel kommt, erhalten alle nicht-Zombie-Kreaturen -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Pestilenza e morte in un'unica, conveniente confezione.
foreignData.name: Ghoul Velenoso
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta il Ghoul Velenoso o un altro Zombie entrano in gioco, tutte le creature non Zombie prendono -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: "Praga e morte virem embaladas num pacote conveniente."

foreignData.flavorText: Peste y muerte envueltas en un paquete práctico.

foreignData.text: Siempre que el Necrófago nocivo u otro Zombie entre en juego, todas las criaturas que no sean Zombies obtienen -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Contaminador palmagema
foreignData.text:
Ciclo {B}{B}. ({B}{B}, descartar esta carta de tu mano: Roba una carta.)
Cuando uses la habilidad de ciclo del Contaminador palmagema, puedes elegir que el jugador objetivo pierda 1 vida por cada Zombie en juego.

mainBoard.name: Gempalm Polluter
mainBoard.originalText:
Cycling {BB} ({BB}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose 1 life for each Zombie in play.

rulings.text: The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability doesn't resolve (because, for example, it has been countered, or all of its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve, and you'll draw a card.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.
You can cycle this card even if there are no legal targets for the triggered ability.

mainBoard.text:
Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle this card, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

mainBoard.flavorText: It oozes death from every pore.

foreignData.flavorText: La mort suinte de tous ses pores.
foreignData.name: Mort suintant
foreignData.text:
Le Mort suintant ne peut pas bloquer.
À chaque fois que le Mort suintant inflige des blessures de combat à une créature, détruisez cette créature. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée.

foreignData.flavorText: Aus jeder Pore tropft der Tod.
foreignData.name: Triefende Tote
foreignData.text:
Die Triefenden Toten können nicht blocken.
Immer wenn die Triefenden Toten einer Kreatur Kampfschaden zufügen, zerstöre diese Kreatur. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden.

foreignData.flavorText: Secerne morte da ogni poro.
foreignData.name: Morto Grondante
foreignData.text:
Il Morto Grondante non può bloccare.
Ogniqualvolta il Morto Grondante infligge danno da combattimento a una creatura, distruggi quella creatura. Non può essere rigenerata.

foreignData.flavorText: Ele transpira morte por todos os poros.
foreignData.name: Morto Gotejante
foreignData.text:
Morto Gotejante não pode bloquear.
Toda vez que Morto Gotejante causar dano de combate a uma criatura, destrói aquela criatura. Ela não pode ser regenerada.

foreignData.flavorText: Rezuma muerte de cada poro.
foreignData.name: Muerto chorreante
foreignData.text:
El Muerto chorreante no puede bloquear.
Siempre que el Muerto chorreante haga daño de combate a una criatura, destruye esa criatura. No puede ser regenerada.

mainBoard.name: Dripping Dead
mainBoard.originalText:
Dripping Dead can't block.

mainBoard.text:
This creature can't block.

foreignData.name: Furchterregende Todesklage

foreignData.name: Lamento di Terrore

Tutte le creature guadagnano paura fino alla fine del turno (non possono essere bloccate tranne che da creature artefatto e/o da creature nere).

foreignData.name: Nênia do Horror

foreignData.name: Canto fúnebre de pavor

Ciclo {1}{B}. ({1}{B}, descartar esta carta de tu mano: Roba una carta.)

mainBoard.name: Dirge of Dread
mainBoard.originalText:
All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)

rulings.text: The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability doesn't resolve (because, for example, it has been countered, or all of its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve, and you'll draw a card.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.
You can cycle this card even if there are no legal targets for the triggered ability.
